EmailTemplate.description: US-0008088 - [US]* Bulk Creation of Deal Records from CSV Upload

EmailTemplate.subject: Deals Bulk Upload Processing Completed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {UploadUser},
Hive has completed the processing of Listing IDs uploaded on {DateTimeUploading} In total, {totalSuccessDeals} records were created.
Here is list of failed records if any:
{listRecordsFail}
Best, HIVE team
